# RCheatsheets

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of RCheatsheets is to compile all R Cheatsheets from the [RStudio cheatsheets github](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets) into just one file at [all_cheatsheets.pdf](./all_cheatsheets.pdf)
